summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAnua Rice 70 Glow Milky Toner is a lightweight milky toner enriched with Niacinamide and Ceramides, to hydrate and brighten the skin to achieve glass skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsA lightweight milky toner to achieve glass skin.For bright glowy skinFragrance-freeFree Of: Alcohol / Parabens / Artificial Color / Sulfates Mineral Oil / Methylchloroisothiazolinone / Methylisothiazolinone / NutsKey Ingredients70% ANUA RICE WATER+: Helps brighten the skin for even complexionNiacinamide: Helps balance sebum production and oil productionCeramides: Helps to form stronger skin barrierResearch Results20.557% improvement in surface skin hydration immediately after useSuitable for acne-prone skin test completedSkin low-irritation test completedAFTER 4 WEEKS:29.788% improvement in oil content12.908% reduction in skin sebum levelsItem 2634193How To UseApply with a cotton pad or pat with the palm of your hands all over your face.Can be used every day, both AM & PM.IngredientsOryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Propanediol, Water, 1,2-Hexanediol, Methyl Gluceth-20, Panthenol, Betaine, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Triethylhexanoin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Adenosine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Xanthan Gum, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Dextrin, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Seed Protein, Ceramide NP, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Arbutin, Ascorbic Acid, Allantoin, Ceramide AP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Ceramide EOP.
how_to_use: Apply with a cotton pad or pat with the palm of your hands all over your face.Can be used every day, both AM & PM.

reviews.headline: Mature skin 47 year-old
reviews.comments: This stuff is amazing. It feels so amazing on your face. I cannot even describe. I highly recommend this.. if you have mature skin, I would recommend this highly

reviews.headline: Obsessed!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for the past six months, and it has been amazing for my skin. I have dry and sensitive skin, so I was pleasantly surprised that my skin did not react negatively to this product. I have noticed a significant improvement in my skin's appearance; it looks brighter, clearer, and more even. I finally found a toner that my skin truly loves!

reviews.headline: This really helped my skin!
reviews.comments: I have dry and acne prone skin and this toner really helped calm/reduce my acne as well as reduce redness. It was also really hydrating and gave my skin a nice natural glow. Definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: WANTED TO LOVE IT‚òπÔ∏è
reviews.comments: I wanted  to like this so bad i heard good reviews but once i tested it on my sensitive acne prone skin it gave me tiny bumps on my forhead. I did see there was a clog pore ingrediant so be aware of that if you have acne. It felt so smooth and refreshing on the skin but it didnt work for me:( If you dont have sensitive skin or you have dry skin this product is for you!

reviews.headline: Very good toner loved it . Good for my daily morning routine
reviews.comments:
Skin type : Oily with severe acne prone skin including fungal acne
The first time I used it , it gave me acne but I expected it because it was a new product for my skin . Next day onwards the acne slowly decreased and my skin felt so relaxed and smooth and calm every time I used it . Now it has been a daily routine for me to use to before my sunscreen and moisturizer. This gives so much moisture that you don't even need to use a moisturizer once you use this( you will need to use a moisturizer if your doing makeup because this toner alone does not help for a good skin prep and a good base and to not go through cakey and crusty makeup). In conclusion this toner did such a good job for my acne and oily skin giving it a plumy glow and moisture and soothing calmness my skin needed. I love it and will purchase it more in the future.

reviews.headline: I LOVE
reviews.comments: recommend this all the way! great product been using about 2 weeks now and can see a difference in my skin! thankfully i didnt really get a purging stage just 3 little pimples but the way my skin looks now yeah totally worth it. i have combo skin btw and i also pair this with the blue drops from ANUA the hyaluronic acid serum just great duo

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This product is amazing, I noticed a difference pretty quickly with how much it clears up my skin and adds some hydration, my skin is sensitive lately and loves it.

reviews.headline: very soothing would recommend!
reviews.comments: love this product!

reviews.headline: Makes my skin silky soft with a glow
reviews.comments: This is my first time trying this and would buy it again.

reviews.headline: Milky toner dream !
reviews.comments: This is a thin, milky toner dream! Soothing and simple. I use this as my 1st toner of 3 at night and the only in AM. Love! Great price for the amt you get as well. Would totally repurchase.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love this!!! Love the glow!
reviews.comments:
This doesnt have a scent, its very milky and thin. It does leave behind a very rich finish. It doesnt break me out, it doesnt irritat my eyes and a little really hydrates. Products sit well on top and this works well if you layer it. 

I have used this for a week and my skin is evening out and definitely looks more glowy and healthy.

reviews.headline: Clogs pores/ not safe for sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: Not safe for sensitive skin! If your acne prone it will cause tiny bumps and clog a lot of your pores like mine :(

reviews.headline: Wanted to love
reviews.comments: Really did want to love this but after multiple weeks of trying it made me break out so its a no for me unfortunately

reviews.headline: Gave me tiny bumps
reviews.comments:
Please be sure you are not sensitive to fermented ingredients/rice. It have me tiny bumps that were annoying. So im going to be returning it.
The ingredients can be pore clogging and i have combination acne prone skin

reviews.headline: No cons
reviews.comments: Best toner!

reviews.comments:
Love this milky toner and the glow it gives my skin
Everyone should try it. Anua is great

reviews.headline: Horrible for My Sensitive Skin
reviews.comments: My sensitive skin just doesn't take to fermented products, unfortunately. After a couple uses, I developed bumps on my face & my skin burned when applying other products in my routine.

reviews.headline: Trying new toner
reviews.comments: I was switching to a new regiment since I was having a lot of dry/dull skin and this toner has made my skin feel so nourished even before the serums/face cream. My makeup application/wear has improved immensely since using the toner.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again.
reviews.comments: Makes my skin feel so good.

faceoff_positive.comments:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion] 

Being 71% Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Water, Anua Rice 70 Glow Milky Toner has the familiar, slightly weighted viscosity of the clouded water after rinsing rice a few times. It is water weight with a bit of slip. There is no smell, even of rice. 

Other ingredients include glycols, the common but powerful humectant glycerin, 2% niacinamide (listed in an answer on the brand's website) and panthenol. The last three lines of the ingredients list show different ceramides and allantoin. 

Ceramides are at their most effective strength in thicker products like creams as the ingredient ceramide itself is thick and not easy to dissolve into formulas. It may have less potency in a watery formula. 

However, I am rating this toner five stars after using it seven days morning and night, because I like the immediate plumping effect it has on my oily, dehydrated skin. This is my first experience with rice water in skincare and so far I like the instant bounce i feel, and how my skin does feel calmer with redness slightly reduced. I'll note that if i apply the toner s few times in a row, it does make my hands slightly tacky feeling. 

At 2% niacinamide, I expect the toner to aid in barrier support more than evening out skintone. A concentration of 3-5% niacinamide is preferred for help with hyperpigmentation. The lower concentration means its not likely to irritate for the sensitive. 

I haven't used the toner long enough to experience the claimed results of sebum control (4 weeks) or improved skintone evenness, but i will happily continue to use this toner to help calm my currently irritated skin experiencing hormonal breakouts.
faceoff_positive.headline: It does plump up my skin

faceoff_negative.comments: I do wish was on the packaging, it had more directions, it simply just says "apply an appropriate amount to the skin." How often should I be doing it? Once, twice a day, week? I don't know. Is it better at night, day? Can it be applied on other areas other than my face? Is it safe near the eyes? Doesn't hurt to be overly informed. I don't like to guess when it comes to things I put on my face. (There's a little more information provided on the Ulta website but not on the product itself). Now to the product itself, there is no smell which I can appreciate because I was told by a dermatologist you don't want fancy perfume stuff on your face, basic clean non scented is best. The consistency was different than what I was expecting, it's more like an oil, not sure why but I thought it would be thicker. With it being more liquidy, it was hard to keep in my hands, it kept slipping through my fingers however, application on my face was easier to spread and it felt very thin. Right away I could feel it drying and within maybe like a minute or so I felt it completely dry so it was pretty fast. Not sure if it was so much a glow than just being shiny. It did make my dry skin feel more hydrated which I appreciated. Even though the consistency is very oily, once it dried on my face, my face did not feel oily at all. A lot of the time  after I put product on my face, it feels very stiff, like it's hard to move my face around, this did not feel like that. It seemed to have lasted on my face for awhile, touched my face like two hours later and still felt soft. I did notice after a couple days of use, I had more acne than usual however I do not know if it's because of this product or related to something else. For reference, I am in my early 30's and tested this product in the winter time when my skin was prone to more dryness. **This review was created through an educational promotional event hosted between the brand and beauty experts.
faceoff_negative.headline: Try it out, it may work for your skin type
